casebody.data:
Benjamin B. Johnston, Respondent v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided January 11, 1892. Appeal from a judgment rendered at the special term. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Joseph E. Lord of counsel, for appellants. Peckham & Tyler for respondent.

Before Freedman, P. J., McAdam and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Gildersleeve, J.; Freedman, P. J., and McAdam, J., concurred.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
